original_text:
you town so full of commotion,
    you city of tumult and revelry?
Your slain were not killed by the sword,
    nor did they die in battle.
korean_text: 소란하며 떠들던 성, 즐거워하던 고을이여 너의 죽임을 당한 자들은 칼에 죽은 것도 아니요 전쟁에 사망한 것도 아니라

sentences.original_text: you town so full of commotion,
you city of tumult and revelry?
Your slain were not killed by the sword,
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 살해된 자들은 칼에 죽지 아니하였고

sentences.original_text: nor did they die in battle.
